text: The Lyndon Baines Johnson Library and Museum, also known as the LBJ Presidential Library, is the presidential library to honor and remember President of the United States Lyndon Baines Johnson. The library was started in 1971. It is next to the LBJ School of Public Affairs in Austin, Texas. ==Other websites== * Lyndon Baines Johnson Library and Museum Johnson Category:Buildings and structures in Texas Category:Lyndon B. Johnson Category:Austin, Texas Category:1971 establishments in the United States Category:1970s establishments in Texas
title: Lyndon Baines Johnson Library and Museum
